name: Anime Memory Game
description: The Anime Memory Game renders different images to the screen and upon each click on an image, the app renders the images in a new random order. The userâ€™s score increments when clicking an image for the first time and resets after an incorrect guess.

name: All The News
description: All the News is a web application created with React and Mongo DB that lets users click a single button to scrape news articles from Fox News.

name: GOT Theories?
description: GOT Theories is a fun interactive application for Game of Thrones fans to post their own theories, as well as comment on other users theories. This application was part of a group project in which I was primarily responsible for the front-end design and development. This application was created with the help of HTML, CSS, Materialize, Javascript, jQuery, Node.js, Handlebars.js, Express, Firebase, MySQL, and Sequelize.

name: Contact Keeper
description: A full stack MERN contact manager with React hooks, context & JWT authentication.

name: Train Schedule
description: This is a train schedule application that demonstrates storing data on a Firebase server. When the user adds a new train to the schedule, the new schedule is appended to the list and pushed to the Firebase server. This application was created with the help of HTML, CSS, Materialize, Javascript, jQuery, Moment.js, and Firebase.

name: GifTastic
description: GifTastic is an enjoyable application that uses the Giphy API to pull gifs of your choosing. GifTastic uses HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and jQuery.
